Govt is committed & works hard to implement an optimum budget for rakyat through prudent spending amid global econ uncertainties #Bajet2017

2017 revenue collection to expand at around 3% to RM219.7b & Govt expected to achieve the fiscal deficit target of 3% of GDP #Bajet2017
The security sector will be allocated RM5.3b & the general administration more than RM2.5b & contingencies will be allocated RM2b #Bajet2017
Under the Developmnt Expenditure, the econ sector will receive the highest share of RM25.9b, followed by social sector w/ RM12.2b #Bajet2017
RM103.9b is allocated for Fixed Charges & Grants. RM691m is allocated for Purchase of Assets & RM816.6m for Other Expenditures #Bajet2017
Under the Operating Expenditure, a total of RM77.4 billion is for Emolument and RM32 billion for Supplies and Services. #Bajet2017
RM214.8 billion is allocated for Operating Expenditure, while RM46 billion for Development Expenditure #Bajet2017
#Bajet2017 allocates a sum of RM260.8 billion, an increase of 3.4% from the 2016 Budget Recalibration.
For the past 60 consecutive years, the Government had sustained the GDP growth at 6% per annum.
